review: We love our Fire TV Stick!
author: Adam

review: Choppy streaming and not as much content as expected.However easy to set up.
author: Henry Swain

review: Still having issues of the picture on the VIZIO TV my daughter purchased for me for Christmas, pulsating when there is words on the screen.  I do not have any pulsating issues on the Samsung TV's at all.
author: Jennice L. White

review: Arrived in the mail yesterday - took less than 10 minutes to open the package & plug into TV.  Super easy set up & since I am a faithful Amazon Prime user, this is the best way to get shows/movies to stream to your TV rather than just on your mobile device.  For the price, you cant go wrong.
author: tlv15

review: Faster than my other devices (latest Roku) and does everything I need so far!
author: Islandflea

review: Great value. This is the second Fire Stick I've purchased. I love the quality and the ease of setup. Works first time and every time. The quality of the unit is obvious and the intuitive nature of using the controller is a major plus. It simply does what it says it's going to do and it does it perfectly. What can be better than that?
author: Randall

review: Amazing for such a little thing. Great Hi Definition programming and knockout screen savers.
author: T. W. Wheat
